channel.title: How do I Register my Server?
channel.description: I tried to register it but it says my server is offline? help?...

item.title: How do I Register my Server?
item.dc:creator: @xxbestxx xxbestxx
item.description:
@xxbestxx wrote:

[quote=“lewis23, post:6, topic:118081”][quote author=xxbestxx link=topic=167381.msg1556405#msg1556405 date=1183158824]
reported- sorry donot keep posting, just edit it- go to modify and edit your post, and when it comes it says something blocked you right click it and say like let it…
[/quote]

he has been editing it ??? what the hell? thats really out of order no affense but come on hes a begginer didnt have to report him he need help not being reported… >:([/quote]
soz, but i had too, he should of read the rules, i’m sorry that he didnt. ne ways,
to portforward make an acc on www.no-ip.com and go to add then get in ur router and write it in ur hostname.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I Register my Server?
item.dc:creator: @i_ancients_i i ancients i
item.description:
@i_ancients_i wrote:

[quote=“Terrorizer, post:9, topic:118081”]well find out what type of router you have, go to portforward.com and under the big arrow click on port forwarding find your router brand and model and click on it, mine isn’t on there…[/quote][quote=“Jack coderz, post:10, topic:118081”]Go to moparscape server advertisements and look for the tut of copyright[/quote] These posts aren’t useful…jacks seems never to be useful

Read full topic

item.title: How do I Register my Server?
item.dc:creator: @justanoob justanoob
item.description:
@justanoob wrote:

If it is the windows firewall there are some things u can do make sure u have port fowarded correctly then go to control panel click security center then windows firewall then click add port make sure it is udp. good luck hmm nvm not sure bout macaffe there should be a place to add a port

Read full topic
